    • createTimer

      public void createTimer()

    • checkGameAction

      public void checkGameAction​(Level currentlevel, Level nextlevel, javafx.scene.Scene nextlevelscene)
      check for appropriate Game Action to perform and execute the Game Action.
      See also : GameAction, UpdateScore, UpdateLife, PopHighScore, UpLevel and GameActionContext.
      Parameters:
      currentlevel - current level of player
      nextlevel - next level player shall proceed to
      nextlevelscene - the scene of the next level player shall proceed to

    • start

      public void start()
      Start the timer of the application

    • endGame

      public void endGame​(Level level)
      End the game
      Parameters:
      level - the level the player is at when the game is ended
